All Classes

Class Description
AdminSceneCreator
Registration form, usually used for registering users, by an admin.
ClientSceneCreator
As a user with the role "classic", therefore as a client of the gym I can register to the available courses or keep track of my progress by adding new entry of my weight.
Course
The course class provides the details of the course as well as the who is the trainer for this course.
CourseDAO
The interface describes which methods will be implemented by the Course class, connected to the DB such as: Get all the courses from the database Add a new course to the database
CourseDAOwithDB
The class implements the methods described in the interface.
Employee
An Employee of the gym, has more rights in the gym app.
EmployeeDAO
The interface describes which methods will be implemented by the Employee class, connected to the DB such as: Get all the employees from the database Add a new employee to the database
EmployeeDAOwithDB
The class implements the methods described in the interface.
GymService
The gym Service takes care of the communication between the frontend and backend via the interfaces.
LoginForm
Login form is the primary stage of the gym App.
Main
Launch the Login form, the primary stage of the gym App.
Role  
RoleDAO
The interface describes which methods will be implemented by the Role class, connected to the DB such as: Get all roles from the database
RoleDAOwithDB
The class implements the methods described in the interface.
Trainer
Compared to an employee (user having the role "admin"), a trainer receives extra benefits for further development such as additional salary budget for specializations and extra vacation days for participation to the courses.
TrainerSceneCreator
Trainer Scene Creator, this view can be accessed only by users with the role trainer.
User
The User class represents the attributes a normal user has, when he logges in the gymApp.
UserCourseRegistration  
UserCourseRegistrationDAO
The interface describes which methods will be implemented by the UserCourseRegistration class, connected to the DB such as: Get all the courses from the database as well as the clients who attend this courses.
UserCourseRegistrationDAOwithDB
As a client of the gym (user role 3 - classic), I have the possibility to attend the courses held by trainers.
UserDAO
The interface describes which methods will be implemented by the User class, connected either to the DB or as a Maker, such as: Get all the employees from the database/maker Add a new employee to the database/maker
UserDAOwithDB
The class implements the methods described in the interface.
UserDAOwithMaker
For easier database population with user data, this class implements the methods described in the interface such as: get all users created by the maker.
UserMaker
User maker class used for easier random generation of user data to be used for database population.
UserMakerTest
Main class for randomly generating of 20 users and populating the user table with the random data.
UserProgress
The class represents the attributes used to described the progress made by a client in the gym.
UserProgressDAO
The interface describes which methods will be implemented by the UserProgress class, connected to the DB, such as: Get all the user progress from the database Add a new weight to the database
UserProgressDAOwithDB
The class implements the methods described in the interface.
